extends java.lang.Object

    Grid.java

    This class defines all the virtual moves,it initializes cells according to a check on there types
    Author:
    Dhruv Bhagat 2016146, Sushant Kumar Singh 2016103

      • funct

        public void funct(int i,
                  int j,
                  char type,
                  Player p,
                  boolean isVirtual)
        Responsible for making a virtual move internally calling corresponding cell,according to checks based on cell types and their positions in the grid
        Parameters:
        i - First parameter,denotes row
        j - Second parameter,denotes column
        type - Third Parameter,denotes the type of cell(based on its position)
        p - Fourth Paramter,denotes the Player
        isVirtual,denotes - the virtual or real check.
